text: Va hangome ki ʙa onon [kofiron] gufta şavad: "Az on ci Alloh taolo nozil kardaast, pajravī kuned", megūjand: [Na] Balki mo az cize pajravī mekunem, ki padaroni xudro ʙar on joftaem. Ojo agar padaronaşon [az haqiqat] cize nafahmidavu hidojat najofta ʙoşand [ʙoz ham kūr – kūrona az onon pajravī mekunand]
